summary: A famous British actress gets involved with two members of a reserved British noble family, whose plan to get rid of her backfires.
cast: Ruth Chatterton|Basil Rathbone|Ralph Forbes|Nance O'Neil|Frederick Kerr|Herbert Bunston|Cyril Chadwick|Effie Ellsler|Robert Bolder|Moon Carroll|Mackenzie Ward|Edgar Norton
title: The Lady of Scandal
